reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on a Top Deck tour and I must say it was not the greatest. The rooms did not have working air conditioning which was ok as it was not too hot but if it had been over 35 degrees it would have been unbearable. The bathroom was mouldy and small but on par with other italian bathrooms. The breakfast and dinners were very poor, in fact on one of the days we had to fight to get breakfast at all. The hotel is about a 45min bus ride from Sorrento so I don't think I would reccomend staying here if you want to be close to the action.
reviews.title: Not a great hotel

reviews.text: Despite reading previous reviews and dreading my trip here I was pleasantly suprised that this hotel wasn't as awful as I'd expected.
reviews.title: Not as bad as painted...

reviews.text: It was booked as part of a trip (Travelscope) and was clean,basic and adequate.
reviews.title: Discerning travellers beware...

reviews.text: Massa Lubrense is further away from Sorrento than I'd liked to have been and don't make the mistake of getting a taxi as I did (costing E45 which was pricey)
reviews.title: Most awful hotel we have ever been to

likes.disliked: — Food, rooms, location, lack of facilities
